info.name: Interactive Vogel Spiral
info.description:
moded code from 0s13k JS Os

Mouse X - Mouse Y 

Interactive

renderpass.code:
#define M iMouse
#define R iResolution
#define T iTime
#define pi 3.14
void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor,in vec2 fragCoord)

{vec2 m=(M.xy)/R.xy+1.3,
u=15.*m.x*(gl_FragCoord.rg-R.rg/2.)/R.r;

float 
d=pow(2.*length(u),1.2),
t=.0025*(T-2000.*m.x),
i=floor(d-atan(u.g,u.r)/pi/2.+.5),
a=atan(u.g,u.r)+pi*2.*i,
h=.004*a+1.5*t,
s=fract(a*1.2*t)<.5?1.:0.,
v=fract(a*t)<.5?0.:1.;

fragColor=vec4(vec3(v-s*v*.5)+vec3(s-1.2*v)*sin(pi*2.*(h+vec3(1.,.222,.333))),1.);}
renderpass.name: Image
